channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Flytipping and ooor state of street, 3rd August
item.description:
I have made previous complaints about Staffordshire st particularly the end nearest Peckham High Street. It is a flytipping hotspot due to being in a blind spot. The lack of care of the street and infrequent litter clearance only encourages the problem. Are currently two mattresses, lots of abandoned bike parts secured to bolards and a broken concrete bollard. Have seen rats openly nosing about in the rubbish. Have actually swept the street myself it is so bad

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 153, Peckham High Street, Peckham, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.category: Fly-tip Medium - Up to medium size van load

item.title: Abandoned Bin at Carysfort Rd / Indigo Mews, 3rd August
item.description:
A Hackney waste bin has been abandoned for at least three weeks on Carysfort Rd. - people have been using it as a public waste bin. I would be grateful if the waste team could collect/remove. Many thanks.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Carysfort Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet
